colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'JAM DPAL YE SHES SEMS DPA'I DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG KA MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
translator_(орчуулагч): SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA, KA MA LA GUPTA,RIN CHEN BZANG PO,
